abstracts.cdata!:
The Industrial Oil Palm Plantation
            Project will help finance the establishment of 12,000 ha of
            outgrower oil palms, 3,500 ha of estate coconuts, 3,000 ha
            of outgrower coconuts, 4,000 ha of estate oil palms at
            Ehania, and the construction of a palm oil mill at Ehania.
